tweet: Administration finalized a rule today allowing year-round E15. This aligns with leg. I cosponsored & will help our #farmers who are facing the challenge of low commodity prices, while also giving travelers more options at the pump. https://bit.ly/30Uxzbn

Mikey & I are saddened to hear of the passing of Sen Cochran. I had the opportunity to serve with him on the Ag & Approps Committees, & to see firsthand his commitment to serving the people of Mississippi & the nation. We extend our sincerest condolences to his family & friends.

We have laid the groundwork for statewide #BVLOS flights, which will be a truly groundbreaking step in the integration of unmanned aircraft into our national airspace. Outlined our #NDUAS efforts while kicking off this year’s #DroneFocus. ↓ https://bit.ly/2WtAzMB

Held a roundtable today with #NDag producers to outline @USDA’s additional ag aid. Securing better trade deals are the ultimate goal, but with China delaying negotiations & targeting our ag industry, this assistance is vital for our producers.

BIG NEWS: The admin just announced a deal to lift steel/aluminum tariffs on Canada & Mexico. Led the ND delegation in urging the President to do this, which will benefit both our manufacturer’s as well as #NDag, and will help as we work to move #USMCA through Congress.

We look forward to working with @POTUS to modernize our immigration system and at the same time will continue working to secure additional funding for border security and to close loopholes in our current immigration laws.
